data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khaustov, Alexandr A. (2010): Three new species of mites of the genus Bakerdania Sasa, 1961 (Acari: Heterostigmata: Neopygmephoridae) from “ Cape Martyan ” Nature Reserve, Crimea. Zootaxa 2600: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197582
